data.name: Fractured Space - Cadet Pack
data.detailed_description:
The Cadet Pack is the entry value bundle for new and existing Fractured Space players


The Cadet Pack includes:

  • USR Pioneer - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • Zarek Venturer - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • TDS Sentinel - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • 500 Platinum
  • Credit Boosters (20)
data.about_the_game:
The Cadet Pack is the entry value bundle for new and existing Fractured Space players


The Cadet Pack includes:

  • USR Pioneer - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • Zarek Venturer - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • TDS Sentinel - Black Edition exclusive skin
  • 500 Platinum
  • Credit Boosters (20)
data.short_description: The Cadet Pack is the entry bundle for Fractured Space players to acquire the exclusive Black Edition skins and a useful Credit and Platinum boost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1 (must have KB 2670838 installed) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.3+ GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: (64 bit only at present) Windows 7 SP1 (must have KB 2670838 installed) / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 with Feature Level 11
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported chipsets: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. We'll be constantly updating the game to lower the required specs, so bear with us if your machine is struggling.
